trends: There has been one other sighting in St. Marys
There were no other sightings in St. Marys on or around August 9th 2013
divs: sighting detailsfriends and i were sitting outside around a campfire, i just so happened to look up and see a red\ orange orb traveling unbelievably fast across the sky. there was no sign of deceleration or fading and it continued nw.
Summary: orange red orb traveling very quickly across the sky without fading, and changed direction West
